result.purpose: Responsible for managing the proxy service in the Ronin wallet application, including configuration, routing, and dependency injection.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, utilizing dependency injection for managing service dependencies and defining clear routes for HTTP services.

cmd/proxy/config.go.purpose: Configuration management for the proxy service in the Ronin wallet application.

cmd/proxy/main.go.purpose: This file initializes and starts a proxy application for the Ronin wallet services.

cmd/proxy/routes.go.purpose: Defines HTTP route groups for private and public proxy services in a wallet application.

cmd/proxy/wire.go.purpose: This file is used for dependency injection setup in the application using Google Wire.

cmd/proxy/wire_gen.go.purpose: Generates dependency injection code using Wire for the application.
